definition: powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink
to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary

sentences.english: Rotor is an important assembly of hammer mill.
sentences.chinese: 转子是锤片式粉碎机的主要工作部件。

sentences.english: The relation between property of hammer crusher and property of separation and breaking was studied.
sentences.chinese: 锤片式粉碎机的设计参数对脱胚破碎指标的影响很大。

sentences.english: A crushing machine reduces big rocks to powder.
sentences.chinese: 粉碎机能把大石块轧成粉末。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a reinforcing hammer slice used in a grinder.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种用于粉碎机的增力锤片。

sentences.english: The rotors are designed as impellers, the materials can be inhaled in the pulverizing room;
sentences.chinese: 转子采用叶轮式设计，物料可自行吸入粉碎机室。

sentences.english: Huge digging machines were needed and crushers to get the gold from the rock.
sentences.chinese: 从岩石中取得黄金需要大型的掘土机和粉碎机。

sentences.english: The invention relates to high wear-resisting hammer sheet used in crasher and its manufactural method.
sentences.chinese: 本发明是关于粉碎机用高耐磨锤片及制造方法。

sentences.english: The imbalance of the rotor is one of the familiar running malfunctions for the muller.
sentences.chinese: 转子不平衡是粉碎机最常见的运动故障原因之一。

sentences.english: The present invention provides a pulverizer of a food waste treatment apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 本发明提供食品废物处理装置的粉碎机。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an air inducing and grass cutting multifunctional disintegrator.
sentences.chinese: 一种引风铡草多功能粉碎机。

sentences.english: Teeth-like crusher can take treated or untreated rolled pulp.
sentences.chinese: 粉碎机齿片式，可适应未处理卷浆和已处理卷浆。

definition: a device for extracting water (such as a centrifuge)
see 球磨機|球磨机[qiu2 mo2 ji1]
